verses.text: \w In|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w after|strong="H3318"\w* Israel \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* land \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*:

“\w The|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w are|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w*.

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w at|strong="H2320"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w*, \w at|strong="H2320"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w in|strong="H6213"\w* accordance \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*,

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Wilderness|strong="H4057"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Sinai|strong="H5514"\w*, \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w first|strong="H7223"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*. \w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w everything|strong="H3605"\w* \w just|strong="H3605"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w some|strong="H3117"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w due|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3201"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, \w so|strong="H6213"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w could|strong="H3201"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w on|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* \w and|strong="H4872"\w* Aaron \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w same|strong="H1931"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w Moses|strong="H7126"\w*, “\w We|strong="H5315"\w* \w are|strong="H1992"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w because|strong="H1115"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, \w but|strong="H1992"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* excluded \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w presenting|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w other|strong="H1115"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w at|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w*?”

“\w Wait|strong="H5975"\w* here \w until|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H6680"\w* find \w out|strong="H4100"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w commands|strong="H6680"\w* \w concerning|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H6680"\w*,” \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w* replied.
\w Then|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H1696"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*,

“\w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w*: ‘\w When|strong="H3588"\w* \w any|strong="H6213"\w* \w one|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H3068"\w* \w descendants|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w unclean|strong="H2931"\w* \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w* \w body|strong="H5315"\w*, \w or|strong="H1121"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w away|strong="H1870"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* \w still|strong="H3588"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Such|strong="H6213"\w* \w people|strong="H6153"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w twilight|strong="H6153"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w fourteenth|strong="H6240"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w second|strong="H8145"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*. \w They|strong="H3117"\w* \w are|strong="H3117"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* eat \w the|strong="H5921"\w* lamb, \w together|strong="H5921"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w unleavened|strong="H4682"\w* \w bread|strong="H4682"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w bitter|strong="H4844"\w* \w herbs|strong="H4844"\w*;

\w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w may|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w break|strong="H7665"\w* \w any|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H4480"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w bones|strong="H6106"\w*. \w They|strong="H3808"\w* \w must|strong="H3808"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w according|strong="H4480"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w its|strong="H3605"\w* \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w*.

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w who|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* ceremonially \w clean|strong="H2889"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w journey|strong="H1870"\w* \w still|strong="H5971"\w* fails \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w*, \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w must|strong="H5375"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w cut|strong="H3772"\w* \w off|strong="H3772"\w* \w from|strong="H3772"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w present|strong="H7126"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w offering|strong="H7133"\w* \w at|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w appointed|strong="H4150"\w* \w time|strong="H4150"\w*. \w That|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* \w bear|strong="H5375"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* consequences \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* \w sin|strong="H2399"\w*.

\w If|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* dwelling among \w you|strong="H3588"\w* wants \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w observe|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w so|strong="H3651"\w* \w according|strong="H4941"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Passover|strong="H6453"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w its|strong="H6213"\w* \w ordinances|strong="H4941"\w*. \w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w apply|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w same|strong="H3651"\w* \w statute|strong="H2708"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* both \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w foreigner|strong="H1616"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* native \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land.’”

\w On|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Tent \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Testimony|strong="H5715"\w*, \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w set|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w appeared|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* fire \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*.

\w It|strong="H3651"\w* \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w that|strong="H3651"\w* \w way|strong="H3651"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*; \w the|strong="H3680"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w would|strong="H6051"\w* \w cover|strong="H3680"\w* \w the|strong="H3680"\w* tabernacle \w by|strong="H6051"\w* day, \w and|strong="H3915"\w* \w at|strong="H1961"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w* \w it|strong="H3651"\w* \w would|strong="H6051"\w* \w appear|strong="H4758"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* fire.

\w Whenever|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Tent|strong="H2583"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w wherever|strong="H4725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w settled|strong="H7931"\w*, \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w*.

\w At|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w*. \w As|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w remained|strong="H2583"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w remained|strong="H2583"\w* \w encamped|strong="H2583"\w*.

\w Even|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* lingered \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*.

\w Sometimes|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* only \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w few|strong="H4557"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w camp|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w Sometimes|strong="H3426"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w remained|strong="H1961"\w* \w only|strong="H5704"\w* \w from|strong="H5265"\w* \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w and|strong="H3119"\w* \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w* \w in|strong="H5927"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w morning|strong="H1242"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w would|strong="H6051"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*. Whether \w it|strong="H1242"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w by|strong="H6051"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* \w or|strong="H5704"\w* \w by|strong="H6051"\w* \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w taken|strong="H5927"\w* \w up|strong="H5927"\w*, \w they|strong="H5704"\w* \w would|strong="H6051"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*.

Whether \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* lingered \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w two|strong="H3808"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \w or|strong="H3808"\w* \w longer|strong="H3808"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israelites|strong="H3478"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w did|strong="H3478"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w long|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w remained|strong="H2583"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w tabernacle|strong="H4908"\w*; \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* \w lifted|strong="H5927"\w*, \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w would|strong="H3478"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w*.

\w They|strong="H3068"\w* \w camped|strong="H2583"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w*, \w and|strong="H4872"\w* \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w set|strong="H5265"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w at|strong="H2583"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w command|strong="H6310"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w carried|strong="H3068"\w* \w out|strong="H5265"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s \w charge|strong="H4931"\w* \w according|strong="H5921"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w His|strong="H8104"\w* \w command|strong="H6310"\w* \w through|strong="H3027"\w* \w Moses|strong="H4872"\w*.
